level.heading: Penalties.
level.text: * ยง 20-804. Penalties. Any child care provider who violates any provision of this subchapter or any rule or regulation promulgated hereunder shall be liable for a civil penalty of not less than two hundred dollars nor more than one thousand dollars for each violation. * NB Validity of local law 23 of 2005 currently a subject of disagreement between the mayor and the city council.
